plugins.name: PFP Composition Generator
plugins.description:
Description:

Goldie's PFP Generator is a specialized Figma plugin designed to streamline the process of creating personalized profile pictures (PFPs). With an intuitive step-by-step operation, it empowers designers to rapidly generate a series of distinct PFPs from a single template artboard.


How It Works:

  1. Prepare Your Template: Construct your PFP template with design elements organized into groups. Each group should represent a category (like Backgrounds, Hairstyles, or Accessories) and contain multiple layers for different variations.
  2. Select Your Template: In your Figma file, click to select the artboard that serves as your PFP template.
  3. Launch the Plugin: From the Figma menu, navigate to Plugins and run "Goldie's PFP Generator."
  4. Set Your Preferences: Enter the desired number of unique PFPs to generate in the input field provided by the plugin.
  5. Generate: Click 'Generate PFP'. The plugin will duplicate your template, randomly toggling the visibility of one layer per group to ensure each PFP is unique.


Folder Structure:

For the plugin to function, each variant of a design element should be a layer within its respective group.


For Example:

An artboard might include...

  • Background_Variants: Include layers like 'Sunset', 'Starry Night', 'Cityscape'.
  • Hairstyles: Layer options like 'Short', 'Curly', 'Long', 'Mohawk'.
  • Eye_Colors: Variants such as 'Brown', 'Blue', 'Green', 'Hazel'.
  • Outfits: Choices like 'Casual', 'Formal', 'Superhero', 'Spacesuit'.
  • Accessories: Items such as 'Sunglasses', 'Earphones', 'Scarf', 'Hat'.


Outcome:

Each new artboard is named sequentially, indicating its order in the duplication process, and features a unique combination of visible layers. The result is a collection of varied PFPs ready for export or further customization.


Goldie's PFP Generator excels in scenarios where creating multiple versions of a design is needed quickly and efficiently, perfect for social media avatars, gaming characters, or any platform requiring a distinct visual identity.


Note: For best results, make sure each variant set is grouped correctly within your template. The plugin's performance is contingent on the logical grouping of layers.


Developed for: Goldie by Bai-ee for Scary Gary's, Gary Ghosts & Cupscriptions *Source Code: https://github.com/Bai-ee/pfp_generator
plugins.tagline: Create a series of unique profile pictures with a single click.

plugins.name: Tolgee localization
plugins.description:
Easily manage translations within your Figma design files by connecting Figma with Tolgee localization platform. With Tolgee’s Figma plugin, the localization team can save time, simplify collaboration, and reduce errors in their localization process.


Tolgee is open-source developer & translator friendly web-based localization platform.


With Tolgee Figma Plugin you can:


  1. Push seamlessly your translations from Figma to Tolgee
  2. Pull your translations from Tolgee back to your Figma designs
  3. Switch languages in your Figma designs
  4. Create page copies with key names or translations
  5. Upload screenshots


Simplify your localization process with our plugin that allows you to seamlessly synchronize text with screenshots from Figma to Tolgee. Connect existing keys, pull translations, and create page copies with ease. Save time and improve efficiency with Tolgee Figma plugin! Learn more


How to Set Up Tolgee Figma Plugin


1. Create project in Tolgee platform

Go to Tolgee Cloud app or access your self-hosted instance and create a project. Then obtain your API key.


2. Install Figma plugin

First, you need to install the plugin from the Figma Community by clicking on the Try it out button. Alternatively, you can find the plugin in Figma by opening the Resources > Plugins, searching for "Tolgee", and then click Run.


3. Setup Figma plugin

After installing and launching the plugin, you need to insert the API key you created previously.

You can then select the language of the Figma file, the default namespace for new keys (if you use namespaces), and whether to hide the namespace selector.

Then click Save, and you are now ready to use the plugin!


Explore more in our documentation.


Want to see Tolgee Figma plugin in action? Request a demo.

accepted.name: Tolgee Team
accepted.description:
Smart platform.
Fast integration.
Painless localization.

plugins.tagline: Tolgee localization in Figma documents.

plugins.name: Variables Ultra｜Management, Rebind, Import & Export, Templates
plugins.description:
Variables Ultra | Management, Rebind, Import & Export, Templates


Variables Ultra is a powerful variable management plugin that implements almost all of the vanilla variable management functionalities in Figma, but with some differences.

We have optimized it based on user feedback and added several premium features such as `Import/Export`, `Variable Rebinding`, and `Generating Variable Set Templates`, among others.


⚡️ Quick Start


After opening the plugin, create your variable collection.


  1. A brand new, unified UI/UX design
  2. Place `Collection` in the same viewport to avoid dropdown menus, enabling quick selection
  3. Click the icon button before the variable name to view/edit details
  4. More user-friendly options for single selection, multi-selection, and select all
  5. More intuitive linking of variables (alias), making operations smoother
  6. Batch modification of multiple variable's scopes


---


One More Thing


  1. [Variable Rebinding]
  2. [Import/Export]
  3. [Material3 Specification Templates]


Please note, these features require a valid subscription to unlock.


---


Variable Rebinding


Want to switch themes?

Modes amount limit?

Use variable sets as your themes to quickly switch different variable

sets for layers, making theme switch effortless.


Follow these steps to prepare:

  1. Prepare two variable sets with different names to represent your different themes.
  2. Create a variable set `Collection A` and create a variable `background`.
  3. Create a variable set `Collection B` and create a variable `background`.
  4. Select any layer and bind its Fill to a variable.
  5. Open the plugin and switch to the `Rebind Var` tab.
  6. Select `Collection A` in the Source and `Collection B` in the Target.
  7. Ensure the red layer is selected in Figma and press the `Rebind` button.
  8. You will see the layer's Fill rebind to `Collection B - background`.


This applies to any nested layers and any number of variables. For more usage, please try playground


Please note, `Rebind Var` cannot rebind the following attributes:

- Fill with gradient colors
- For rich text, you can only choose one of the following:
- Bind `String Variable` to Text Content
- Bind any variable to Text Style instead of the text content itself


---


Import and Export


We often need to apply variables to multiple Figma files, and manually recreating them one by one can be a massive task.


  1. We have prepared a Shared Collection:
  2. a-background links to Collection A - background
  3. b-background links to Collection B - background
  4. blue is set to #0000FF
  5. blue-alias links to blue
  6. a-background-alias links to a-background


Click the export button in the bottom right corner to generate a JSON file containing all the variable sets and variables.


2. Import


Switch to Import/Export tab and select the JSON file to import.


---


Material3 Specification Templates


Material3 specification templates are provided to help you quickly set up variables according to the Material3 design guidelines.


---


Variables Ultra是一款强大的变量管理插件，实现了几乎所有香草的变量管理的功能，但又不完全一样，我们统计了一些样本，专门针对使用体验进行了优化，同时也增加了一些付费功能: 导入/导出、变量重绑定、生成变量集模板等等



⚡️ 快速开始


打开插件后，创建你的变量集


  1. 全新且统一设计语言的 UI/UX
  2. 将 `Collection` 放入同一视口避免使用下拉框，方便快速选择
  3. 点击变量名前面的图标按钮以查看/编辑详情
  4. 更人性化的单选、多选、全选
  5. 更人性化的链接变量（别名），操作更流畅
  6. 批量修改多个变量的可选范围


---


One more thing


  1. [变量重绑定](#变量重绑定)
  2. [导入/导出](#导入和导出)
  3. [Material3 规范模版](#Material3规范模版)


> 请注意，这些功能需要一个可用的订阅以解锁


---


变量重绑定

想要切换主题？Mode数量限制？使用变量集作为你的主题，快速为图层切换不同的变量集合，轻松实现主题替换


为你的设计增加一个不同的主题风格，很简单。


你需要按照以下步骤做一些准备：

  1. 准备两个不同名称的变量集，以表示你的不同主题
  2. 创建变量集 Collection A，并创建变量 background
  3. 创建变量集 Collection B，并创建变量 background
  4. 选择任意一个图层，将它的 Fill 绑定一个变量，比如 Collection A - backgroud
  5. 打开插件，切换到 Rebind Var 标签页
  6. 在 Source Collection 中选择 Collection A
  7. 在 Target Collection 中选择 Collection B
  8. 确保在 figma 中已经选中了红色图层，并按下 Rebind 按钮


最终你会看到图层的 Fill ，重新绑定到 Collection B - backgroud


***这适用于任意嵌套的图层，以及任意数量的变量。更多的用法请尝试playground***


> 请注意，Rebind Var 无法对以下属性进行重新绑定

  1. 带有渐变颜色的 Fill
  2. 对于富文本来说，你只能在以下二选一

- 将 String Variable 绑定到 Text Content

- 将任意变量绑定到 Text Style 而不是文本内容本身


---


导入和导出


我们经常需要将变量应用到多个 figma 文件中，一个一个手动重建将会是一个巨大的工程。但现在有了导入/导出，只需要两个按钮就可以做到


  1. 让我们准备一个 `Shared Collection`
  2. a-background 链接到 Collection A - backgroud
  3. b-background 链接到 Collection B - backgroud
  4. blue 设置为 #0000FF
  5. blue-alias 链接到 blue
  6. a-background-alias 链接到 a-background


点击右下角的导出按钮，将会生成一个 json 文件，包含了所有的变量集和变量


2. 导入

1. 切换到 Import Var 标签页，并选择刚才导出的 json 文件

2. 正如我们刚才导出的一样，你会看到所有的变量集和它们的依赖关系

3. 选择需要导入的变量集，对于有依赖关系的变量集，插件会自动导入依赖的变量集

4. 点击导入按钮，完成操作


---


Material3规范模版


只需要选择一个种子色，即可生成一个 Material3 规范的变量集

生成多个变量集，即可使用 `Rebind Var` 功能，快速切换主题

accepted.name: Balamia
accepted.description: balamiadesign@gmail.com

plugins.tagline: Variable Rebinding, JSON export, optional variable import, and M3-compliant template generation.

plugins.name: Structure Cleaner
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you quickly remove all frames that do not affect the overall design, i.e. those that contain additional single frames and do not have any properties such as color. Such frames do not fulfill any grouping or visual role, so they can be considered unnecessary.


Plugin offers two levels of restructuring level options:

  1. Hard - this option removes every redundant frame even with padding applied - you can then add it on remaining frames to have the same effect.
  2. Soft - this option removes only redundant frames with no padding aplied.


Simply select the frames you want to clean, choose your desired action, and the plugin will efficiently process your selection, helping you maintain a cleaner and more organized design structure. If no redundant frames are found, it will notify you of the clean status.
plugins.tagline: Keep your structure clean and remove unnecessary single-child frames. that have no properties.

96655.name: Structure Cleaner
96655.description:
This plugin helps you quickly remove all frames that do not affect the overall design, i.e. those that contain additional single frames and do not have any properties such as color. Such frames do not fulfill any grouping or visual role, so they can be considered unnecessary.


Plugin offers two levels of restructuring level options:

  1. Hard - this option removes every redundant frame even with padding applied - you can then add it on remaining frames to have the same effect.
  2. Soft - this option removes only redundant frames with no padding aplied.


Simply select the frames you want to clean, choose your desired action, and the plugin will efficiently process your selection, helping you maintain a cleaner and more organized design structure. If no redundant frames are found, it will notify you of the clean status.
96655.tagline: Keep your structure clean and remove unnecessary single-child frames. that have no properties.

Find & Replace

plugins.name: Resize Commands
plugins.description:
Inspired by the original "Resize Commands" plugin for Sketch (https://github.com/ajilderda/Sketch-Resize-Commands), this plugin lets you resize one or multiple layers with simple commands, by typing them like so: "l+50". You can also combine multiple commands by seperating them with a comma, like so: "l+50,r+20". If you check the box "Ignore Constraints", the elements will be resized without applying the individual constraints.

Developed at Syncier.

The following directions are supported at the moment:
l -> left
r -> right
t -> top
b -> bottom
w -> width (same as "right")
h -> height (same as "bottom")
x -> x-axis
y -> y-axis

The following operators are supported at the moment:
+ -> plus
- -> minus
= -> set x, y, w or h

You can apply the command by hitting "Enter".

accepted.name: Mark Meyer
accepted.description: Interaction / Strategic Designer

plugins.name: Textlint for Japanese
plugins.description:
実用文としてわかりやすい日本語を書くための文章解析ツールです。


以下の観点から、選択したテキストレイヤーの文章をチェックできます。


  1. 長すぎる文書を用いない
  2. 読点を多用しない
  3. 漢字は連続して使用しない
  4. 漢数字と算用数字を使い分ける
  5. 二重否定は使用しない
  6. ら抜き言葉を使用しない
  7. 同じ接続詞を連続して使用しない
  8. 同じ助詞を多用しない
  9. 冗長な表現を用いない
  10. 「ですます調」と「である調」を混在させない
  11. 漢字とひらがなを使い分ける


注意

ルールの閾値を変更することができますが、Figmaのストレージを使用しているので閾値の設定内容を共有ができません。


ファイル間で同じ閾値設定を利用したい場合や、他ユーザーと閾値設定を共有したい場合は、Notion連携をご利用ください。

詳しい設定方法はこちら


今後の機能拡張予定

  1. リアルタイムでのチェック
  2. コンポーネント単位でルールを設定すること


---


This is a text analysis tool for writing Japanese that is easy to understand as a practical text.


You can check sentences in a selected text layer from the following perspectives.


  1. Do not use documents that are too long
  2. Do not use too many reading marks
  3. Do not use consecutive Kanji characters
  4. Use Chinese numerals and alphanumeric characters appropriately
  5. Do not use double negatives
  6. Do not use "ら抜き言葉".
  7. Do not use the same conjunction consecutively
  8. Do not use the same particle too often
  9. Do not use redundant expressions
  10. Do not mix "です" "ます" and "である" styles.
  11. Use Kanji and Hiragana appropriately



Caution


You can change the threshold values of the rules, but since Figma storage is used, the threshold settings cannot be shared.


If you wish to use the same threshold settings across files or share threshold settings with other users, please use Notion Linkage.


Click here for detailed setting instructions.




Future Plans for Functional Enhancements


  1. Real-time checking
  2. Setting rules on a per-component basis

accepted.name: Kaoli Ueda
accepted.description: UI Designer

plugins.tagline: 読みやすい文章のための解析ツール

plugins.name: Text2CSS
plugins.description:
Text2CSS is a powerful Figma plugin that transforms your text styles into clean, customizable CSS code. Whether you're using standard CSS, Tailwind, SCSS, SASS, or inline styles, Text2CSS gives you full control over the output — including unit preferences (px, rem, em), color formats (hex, short hex, rgb, rgba, hsl, hsla, and named CSS colors), and custom class/ID naming conventions.


Designed for both developers and designers, Text2CSS makes it easy to export typography from Figma into production-ready code. With advanced formatting options and support for modern CSS workflows, it streamlines your handoff process and keeps your styles consistent across projects.

plugins.name: Automotive Design for Compose
plugins.description:
Automotive Design for Compose is an extension to Jetpack Compose. It allows every screen, component, and overlay to be defined in Figma. To use Automotive Design for Compose in an app, the developer specifies the Composables that they’d like to be defined by Figma, and the designer draws them. Most Figma features, including Auto Layout, Interactions, and Blend Modes are fully supported.


The plugin

The Automotive Design for Compose plugin performs several essential functions in the design workflow:

  1. Live text format: specify how multiple lines of text should be presented
  2. Check document for errors: review design doc for any keyword tagging errors
  3. Check/update keywords: ensure your design doc is using the latest set of keywords
  4. Sync prototype changes: push latest prototype version to Live View
  5. Localization tool: pull strings from the figma design and generate a strings xml file, pull images from figma design and generate a drawable.zip file
  6. Support to set shader code as a background or a stroke for a node


Get started

Automotive Design for Compose is open source. Download the Figma plugin here, and then head over to our GitHub repo to download the SDK and check out a tutorial.

Suggestions and/or feedback? Send it here.

accepted.name: Automotive Design for Compose
accepted.description: Automotive Design for Compose enables design-driven UI development with AAOS.

plugins.name: BulkMeta
plugins.description:
Are you tired of wasting time manually editing component descriptions and documentation URLs in Figma? Streamline your design system management with BulkMeta! BulkMeta allows you to export all component metadata from your Figma libraries, including descriptions, documentation URLs and names, as a JSON file. With the exported JSON file, you can easily make quick sweeping changes to your component metadata using an external editor like VS Code. Once you're done, simply import the modified JSON file back into Figma, and voila! Your design system is updated with minimal effort.


How To Use


  1. Run the BulkMeta plugin and click the "Export" button to generate a JSON file containing your component metadata
  2. Open the JSON file in a text editor like VS Code and modify the component metadata
  3. Create a new branch of your current Figma library if you have the option
  4. Run the BulkMeta plugin and click the "Import" button and select the updated JSON file
  5. Watch all the component metadata update with your new changes
  6. If you are happy with the changes, merge the branch
  7. Profit


Export Component Variants


You can choose to include component variants in your export so you can be ultra detailed on your documentation. Though, depending on how many variants you have, you could be spending a lot of time editing your metadata.


Editing JSON File


A couple of quick rules when editing your JSON file:


  • DO NOT EDIT THE ID - The ID is what is used to match your updated metadata to the component when importing your updated JSON file.
  • If you have paragraphs in your descriptions they are represented as \n\n in the description metadata
  • If you have exported component variants you will see parentName metadata. THIS IS NOT USED, it is only a reference for you so you can be sure what component set the variant belongs to
  • You CAN modify the component name!


Love BulkMeta? Buy me a coffee 🤩

accepted.name: Kirk Bentley
accepted.description:
Pixel pusher & Tiger herder

Love my resources?
Buy me a coffee:  https://www.buymeacoffee.com/kirkbentley

plugins.tagline: Make Design System meta management easier. Export and Import component meta data in bulk.

plugins.name: Font Replace
plugins.description:
Elevate your design projects with Font Replace for Figma and FigJam, the ultimate solution for seamless font management and customization. This powerful plugin enables designers to efficiently detect, replace, and manage fonts within their Figma files, ensuring consistency and enhancing the overall design workflow. Whether you’re updating a project with a new brand font or ensuring text uniformity, Font Replacer makes the process effortless and precise.


Features:


  1. Layer Selection: Easily select specific layers within your Figma file to initiate the font replacement process, streamlining your workflow.
  2. Font Detection: Automatically identify and list all fonts used in the selected layer, including font group names and font weights, for comprehensive management.
  3. Font Replacement: Search for and select new fonts to replace existing ones. Font Replacer supports the simultaneous replacement of multiple fonts, saving you time and effort.
  4. Text Style Application: Apply new fonts to the text styles within the selected layer, ensuring consistent typography throughout your design.
  5. Free Usage and Upgrade Option: Start with a limited number of free tries and upgrade to unlimited usage, offering flexibility to suit your needs.
  6. License Management: Unlock unlimited usage by entering your license code and gain access to premium customer support for any issues or inquiries.
  7. User Notifications: Stay informed with notifications about your usage limits and easily upgrade to continue using the plugin without interruptions.
  8. Customer Support: Reach out to our dedicated support team for assistance with any plugin-related concerns, ensuring a smooth and productive experience.


Why Choose Font Replace?


Font Replacer is designed to provide designers with a robust tool for managing and customizing fonts within Figma. Whether you're working on a single project or managing multiple designs, Font Replacer offers the precision and efficiency needed to maintain consistent typography across all your work.


Get Started Today!


Download and install Font Replace from the Figma Community Store and enhance your design workflow with the power of efficient font management and customization.

plugins.name: J4F
plugins.description:
J4F (Jira for Figma) helps you to manage your Jira issues right from Figma. You can change issues status and attach related frames links to the issue in one click. No more jumping between tabs and copy-pasting links.


J4F is not affiliated with Jira or Figma, it's developed by a third-party developer.


Before you start, please open "Settings" and fill required data.


The plugin requires an internet connection for work.


We are in beta now, we will be glad to get any feedback and feature requests right here in comments or by email to karimshakirov+j4f@gmail.com.


We are using Mixpanel for analytics to make our product better. We store your Email, Jira URL, and Documents IDs to create customer profiles to understand different usage scenarios. We will not share or sell your data.


Pricing: While in Beta, J4F will be free, later we might change the pricing model.

plugins.name: Aspect Ratio Lock
plugins.description:
Preserve Aspect Ratios While Resizing

Aspect Ratio Lock helps you create aspect ratio containers in Figma, that maintain their intended proportions while resizing. Simply define your desired aspect ratio, choose your content type (image or component), and let the plugin handle the rest.


With intuitive auto layout features, your aspect ratios will adapt seamlessly to your content, enhancing both functionality and aesthetic appeal.


IMPORTANT: You will notice a diagonal line in every Aspect Ratio Unit. To remove this, locate the Aspect Ratio Keeper frame in the provided master component and change the height from 1 to 0.
plugins.tagline: Create containers that preserve the Aspect Ratio of your Images & Components while resizing.

plugins.name: Codia AI Canva: Import Canva Designs to Editable Figma
plugins.description:
Simplify Your Design Workflow with the Canva to Editable Figma Plugin——The ideal solution for quickly converting your Canva files into fully editable Figma layers. This tool enhances efficiency, precision, and security when transitioning from Canva to Figma.


Key Features and Advantages


Fast Conversion

Instantly import your Canva document into Figma with minimal loading times, speeding up your design process without sacrificing quality.


Fully Editable Layers

Every element from your Canva document is converted into fully editable layers in Figma, ensuring you have complete control over adjustments and iterations.


High Compatibility & Perfect Conversion

Enjoy seamless compatibility between Canva and Figma. The plugin ensures that all your design elements, including fonts, effects, and layer structures, are perfectly preserved during the transition.


Privacy Protection

Your files are handled securely throughout the import process, ensuring that your designs remain private and protected.


Streamline Your Design Process

Using the Canva to Editable Figma Plugin will revolutionize your workflow, saving you valuable time and effort. Instead of manually recreating designs in Figma or struggling with compatibility issues, this plugin automates the process, delivering pixel-perfect conversions with full layer editability.


Whether you’re part of a team collaborating on projects or working solo, the ability to instantly convert Canva document ensures smoother design handoffs and iterations. With fast, accurate, and secure file conversions, you can focus more on creativity and collaboration, knowing your designs are perfectly preserved across platforms.


Call to Action☎️

For support issues: Slack Twitter Email Codia.AI

accepted.description: Anything to Design, Anything to Code.

plugins.name: figma转html代码 Figma to html
plugins.description:
Introduction】

This plugin allows you to convert selected Figma elements into HTML and CSS, offering the ability to preview and download the generated code. It's a helpful tool for designers and developers who want to quickly transform their designs into functional HTML structure and styling.


Function Description

  1. Convert Figma elements (frames, text, shapes, etc.) into HTML and CSS.
  2. Preview the generated HTML and CSS in real time.
  3. Copy the generated HTML and CSS code to your clipboard.
  4. Download the HTML file with embedded CSS for immediate use.


How to Use

  1. Select the desired elements in your Figma design.
  2. Click the "Generate HTML & CSS" button.
  3. View the generated HTML and CSS, then copy or download the code as needed.
  4. Preview the output directly in the plugin interface.


Notes

  1. Ensure you have selected the correct Figma elements before generating code.
  2. For more complex designs, ensure that all layers and frames are properly named and structured for better results.
  3. Generated HTML and CSS may need some manual adjustments depending on your requirements.


介绍

该插件允许您将选中的 Figma 元素转换为 HTML 和 CSS，并支持实时预览和下载生成的代码。对于希望快速将设计转换为功能性 HTML 结构和样式的设计师和开发人员来说，这是一个非常实用的工具。


功能说明

  1. 将 Figma 元素（框架、文本、形状等）转换为 HTML 和 CSS。
  2. 实时预览生成的 HTML 和 CSS。
  3. 复制生成的 HTML 和 CSS 代码到剪贴板。
  4. 下载包含嵌入式 CSS 的 HTML 文件，立即使用。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 设计中选择需要的元素。
  2. 点击“Generate HTML & CSS”按钮。
  3. 查看生成的 HTML 和 CSS 代码，并根据需要复制或下载代码。
  4. 在插件界面中直接预览输出结果。


注意事项

  1. 确保在生成代码之前已正确选择 Figma 元素。
  2. 对于更复杂的设计，请确保所有图层和框架命名正确且结构合理，以获得更好的效果。
  3. 生成的 HTML 和 CSS 可能需要根据您的需求进行手动调整。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Convert Figma elements to HTML/CSS, with download

plugins.name: Figma2UMG - Unreal Importer
plugins.description:
Figma2UMG is a powerful plugin designed to seamlessly integrate Figma designs into Unreal Engine projects by generating Unreal Motion Graphics UI Designer (UMG) files. With Figma2UMG, developers and designers can easily import Figma assets, including UI designs, icons, and graphics, directly into their Unreal Engine environment. The plugin simplifies the workflow between design and development teams, allowing for efficient collaboration and rapid prototyping. Figma2UMG supports the import of Figma files while preserving frames, components, groups, and other design elements, ensuring fidelity and accuracy during the transition from design to implementation. Whether creating immersive experiences or interactive applications, Figma2UMG empowers developers to bring their Figma designs to life within Unreal Engine with ease. This plugin utilizes the Figma REST API and requires an access token for authentication.




The importer will be released in Unreal Marketplace.

For now, you can support its development at https://www.patreon.com/Figma2UMG
plugins.tagline: Unreal Engine Importer

plugins.name: Generate 01
plugins.description:
Generate is prompt-to-design copilot that creates variations of your brand assets within seconds.


Plugin is in public beta.

Sign up via plugin and get 50 free generation credits.


Use cases

Quickly populate assets with text and images

Generate variations of assets using brand styles

Bulk translate assets to different languages

Create custom presentations for different clients

Generate on-demand portfolio visuals

Many more


Get started

▸ Watch file setup tutorial (3:43)

✶ Play with prompts in a demo file


To use "Generate" with your file, you will need to add designs from which to generate and describe what to customize in these designs. The setup usually takes 3 minutes:

  1. Select a frame and run "Generate → Add Template" to add template. Describe how and when to use the template. Add several templates, or stick to only one design. The frame should be in a section or in the root of your file page.
  2. Select a layer inside your template to describe how to use it via "Generate → Add Layer". Specify which fills, strokes, or effects styles to apply. Describe how to generate text including tone of voice and number of words.
  3. Generate new variations by typing a prompt. When prompting, make sure to mention how many variants you need, changes you want to apply, specific template or size of the frame.

Explore step by step the manual in the playground file. This plugin uses existing styles, so make sure to add all the text, fill, effect and stroke styles.


Features

✧ Generate from images. Drag and drop images to Figma and use them with your templates

✧ Generate with text. Add text to Figma, and describe how to use it in a template.

✧ Assign file instructions. Describe the high-level rules for every generation

✧ File handoff. Setup the rules for the file and give access to your team


Support

Report a bug

Discord

Email


Thank you for your interest in "Generate" beta

Leave feedback

Request more generations
plugins.tagline: AI copilot guided by your design system

plugins.name: Coordinates from centre
plugins.description:
When selecting an object that is nested within a Frame, this plugin will show you the object coordinates relative to the centre of the Frame and the centre of the object.


You can use the copy buttons to easily copy the coordinates to the clipboard.


Current limitations:

  1. It doesn't show accurate coordinates of objects nested within components.
  2. When objects are not snapped to the pixel grid, whether because of the user settings or because of a layout group positioning, the resulting coordinates will be rounded to the closest integer.
plugins.tagline: Get the coordinages of a selected object relative to the center of the parent Frame.

plugins.name: VariablesToCode
plugins.description:
VariablesToCode is a powerful Figma plugin that transforms design system variables into production-ready code for multiple platforms. It bridges the gap between design and development by providing seamless code conversion capabilities.


Supported Formats:

  1. Android (XML)
  2. iOS (Swift)
  3. Flutter (Dart)
  4. Web (CSS)
  5. JSON


Variable Types:

  1. Color
  2. Number
  3. String
  4. Boolean


Key Features:

  1. Dark/Light mode support
  2. Automatic Variable Alias resolution
  3. Responsive design support
  4. Preview & Download


Important Notes:

  1. Only supports mode names: Light, Dark or Mobile, Tablet, PC
  2. Other mode names may not convert properly


---------


VariablesToCode는 디자인 시스템 변수를 다양한 플랫폼의 제품용 코드로 변환하는 Figma 플러그인입니다. 디자인과 개발 사이의 간극을 원활한 코드 변환 기능을 통해 해소합니다.


지원 형식:

  1. Android (XML)
  2. iOS (Swift)
  3. Flutter (Dart)
  4. Web (CSS)
  5. JSON


변수 타입:

  1. Color
  2. Number
  3. String
  4. Boolean


주요 기능:

  1. 라이트/다크 모드 지원
  2. 변수 별칭 자동 해석
  3. 반응형 디자인 지원
  4. 미리보기 & 다운로드


유의사항:

  1. 지원되는 모드명: Light, Dark 또는 Mobile, Tablet, PC
  2. 다른 모드명 사용 시 정상 변환되지 않을 수 있습니다.
plugins.tagline: Transforms Figma variables into production-ready code for multiple platforms.

plugins.name: Topo
plugins.description:
Review and report instances and components from Figma.


Topo is a Figma Plugin that will allow you report and comment on specific components and post it to any Slack channel or endpoint you want.


You can try Topo for free for up to 3 component reports. Once you buy a license you're entitled to a lifetime license key and updates, while supporting and contributing to build better features and more plugins and tools.


Get lifetime license


General usage:

  • Add Topo integration for Slack
  • With Topo opened, select an Instance or Component you want to review or report in your Figma file.
  • Hit 'Report'.
  • Check the Slack channel and keep track of what's being reported and resolved.


Crafted for design system and library management teams

Allow everyone to report component errors, bugs or issues in a single channel, integrated with the tools you use everyday. Keep track of what’s being resolved.


No need to stop designing

Stop jumping into calls and sending messages that get lost in the discussion. Report without leaving Figma.


Connect your own endpoint for integration with other tools

If you don’t want to use the default Slack app, you can send the reported data to any custom endpoint. Maybe your own API to create JIRA tickets?

accepted.name: Santiago Moreno
accepted.description: In love with Code, Motion and Typography. I really, really enjoy building stuff and prototyping 🇨🇴
